scripts.build: echo "Initial CWD (should be /workspace/apps/test-app): $(pwd)" && echo "Current Node.js version:" && node --version && echo "Ensuring pnpm@10.11.0 is used via npx..." && npx pnpm@10.11.0 --version && echo "Changing to MONOREPO ROOT (/workspace)..." && cd /workspace && echo "CWD after cd /workspace: $(pwd)" && echo "Running pnpm install from MONOREPO ROOT..." && PNPM_STORE_PATH=/workspace/.pnpm-store npx pnpm@10.11.0 install --frozen-lockfile && echo "Running nx build from MONOREPO ROOT..." && PNPM_STORE_PATH=/workspace/.pnpm-store npx pnpm@10.11.0 exec nx build test-app --configuration=production && echo "Build script finished."
scripts.start: echo "Initial CWD (should be /workspace/apps/test-app): $(pwd)" && echo "Current Node.js version:" && node --version && echo "Ensuring pnpm@10.11.0 is used for start script via npx..." && npx pnpm@10.11.0 --version && echo "Changing to MONOREPO ROOT (/workspace) for start..." && cd /workspace && PNPM_STORE_PATH=/workspace/.pnpm-store npx pnpm@10.11.0 exec serve -s dist/apps/test-app/browser -l tcp://0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8080}
